gate_name: Sprint 1 Quality Gate: Core Auth Security
criteria: >90% test coverage for all Cloud Functions; All security rule tests passing; Brute-force protection manually verified; No critical issues in static code analysis.
success_metrics: Zero security vulnerabilities identified in the onboarding and authentication flows.

gate_name: Sprint 3 Quality Gate: Core Attendance E2E
criteria: All E2E tests for check-in, check-out, and permission flows passing on both iOS and Android physical devices; All acceptance criteria for US-028, US-029, US-076, US-077 met.
success_metrics: Core attendance workflow is stable, reliable, and meets all functional requirements.

criteria: E2E tests for offline check-in/out and automatic sync passing with a >99.5% success rate on both iOS and Android; Supervisor approval workflow is functional end-to-end.
success_metrics: Offline features are robust and reliable, meeting the core business requirement (RISK-005).
